subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A pitch by the Brewers’ Johnny Hellweg hit the Mets’ David Wright in the helmet Thursday. A test revealed no concussion, but a swollen thumb kept him out of Friday’s game.
snippet: A pitch by the Brewers’ Johnny Hellweg hit the Mets’ David Wright in the helmet Thursday. A test revealed no concussion, but a swollen thumb kept him out of Friday’s game.
